subject: Order being returned to sender
description_text:
Hello, I recently ordered the following and per Amazon and SF Express, thi is being returned.

Problem occurred
SIMSONN Racing Simulator Pedals Plus X Control BoxSold by: SIMSONNSupplied by: OtherReturn or replace items: Eligible through September 19, 2025$25.00SIMSONN PLUS X Pedals Sim Racing Pedals Vibration Motor VAM Pro Haptic Reactor (VAM 3 PCS PER SET)Sold by: SIMSONNSupplied by: Other$52.00

Please resolve.
Order placed August 15, 2025  Order # 112-4233887-1764209

SF Express Tracking #: 
Tracking ID: SF6045859411342

Thank you
Rick Burns

conversations.body_text: Hi Rick Burns,  The motor was returned during the inspection process by the logistics company, but I will resend your order tomorrow. Please don’t worry.

Hello, 
I've entered the tracking number in the link you provided and nothing happens. 
Can you please confim control box and &3 haptic reactor set is being sent? Thanks
